text: Daniel Ściślak (born 13 March 2000), is a Polish professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Górnik Zabrze.http://www.90minut.pl/kariera.php?id=33082 ==References== ==External links== * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Jarota Jarocin players Category:Lech Poznań players Category:Górnik Zabrze players Category:Ekstraklasa players
title: Daniel Ściślak
